Fn::Join: ","Payload.$":"$"}},"WorkflowSuccess":{"Type":"Succeed","Comment":"Batch ingestion workflow completed successfully"},"StoreFailed":{"Type":"Fail","Error":"StoreError","Cause":"Store stage failed after retries"},"ScoreFailed":{"Type":"Fail","Error":"ScoreError","Cause":"Score stage failed after retries"},"FilterFailed":{"Type":"Fail","Error":"FilterError","Cause":"Filter stage failed after retries"},"ETLFailed":{"Type":"Fail","Error":"ETLError","Cause":"ETL stage failed after retries"}},"TimeoutSeconds":14400}

aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.name: ceap-customer-events-dev
